alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Susquehanna County through 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harford, or 9 miles east of Montrose, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Harford, Hallstead, New Milford, Lanesboro, Gibson, Lakeview and Lakeside. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 217 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
